name: ASCII Fun #1: X- Shape
description:
You will get an odd integer `n` (`n >= 3`) and your task is to draw an X. The lines are separated by newlines (`\n`).

Use the following characters: `'■'` and `'□'` (Ruby, Crystal and PHP: `'o'` and `' '`).

## Examples

```
                                     ■□□□■
            ■□■                      □■□■□
  x(3) =>   □■□             x(5) =>  □□■□□
            ■□■                      □■□■□
                                     ■□□□■
```

---
